channel.title: Get error when someone dies.....Then crashes
channel.description:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerExceptio at stream.createFrameVarSize(stream.java:160) at client.sendMessage(client.java:9047) at client.PKz(client.java:19984) at client.ApplyDead(client.java:20068) at client.ApplyDead(client.java:20058) at client.Poison(client.java:6879) at client.process(client.java:13691) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:47)[/code]
This comes up SOMETIMES when someone dies, happens about eveyr 15-30 mins. It comes up in runserver. Could someone help me out here. Its a pimpscape server k thanks.

item.title: Get error when someone dies.....Then crashes
item.dc:creator: @AARisAIR AARisAIR
item.description:
@AARisAIR wrote:

Yep it kicks everyone off, i’ve noticed when its only when I have a lot of players on if there arnt many it (usually) dosnt.

Read full topic

item.title: Get error when someone dies.....Then crashes
item.dc:creator: @eambo eambo
item.description:
@eambo wrote:

Strange… it shouldn’t. I use pimpscape and it simply disconnects the person who died, then sends them back to the bank X.x

Read full topic

item.source: Get error when someone dies.....Then crashes

item.title: Get error when someone dies.....Then crashes
item.dc:creator: @eambo eambo
item.description:
@eambo wrote:

I believe this makes you spawn in the bank. It’s not a server crash, it simply disconnects your client, reconnects you and you’re in lumbridge bank. Think of it like runescape’s “loading - please wait” when you die, except not =-P

Read full topic
